testcase.classname: As a data consumer, I want the user information are stored in mySql DB correctly in users table.
testcase.name: verify users has unique IDs
testcase.system-out: When Execute query to get all IDs from users................................passed Then verify all users has unique ID.........................................passed

testcase.classname: As a data consumer, I want the user information are stored in mySql DB correctly in users table.
testcase.name: verify users table columns
testcase.system-out: When Execute query to get all columns.......................................passed Then verify the below columns are listed in result..........................passed

testcase.classname: As a librarian, I want to know borrowed books number
testcase.name: verify the total amount of borrowed books
testcase.system-out: Given user login as a "librarian"...........................................passed When user take borrowed books number........................................passed Then borrowed books number information must match with DB...................passed

testcase.classname: As a data consumer, I want UI and DB book categories are match.
testcase.name: verify book categories with DB
testcase.system-out: Given I login as a "librarian"..............................................passed When I navigate to Books page...............................................passed And I take all book categories in UI........................................passed And I execute query to get book categories..................................passed Then verify book categories must match book_categories table from db........passed
